original_title: Eugene Cole & Persuaded: Live: Jesus Is the Balm
overview: Gospel singer and top headliner Eugene Cole and his ensemble Persuaded, from Tabernacle of David Baptist Church in Vallejo, are hugely popular gospel-lovers. Cole -- who stands 6' 7", weighs 300 pounds and is gifted with a sublime tenor voice and a heavenly register -- is fast developing a national renown as a truly inspired gospel singer. In this rousing live performance, Cole and Persuaded raise the rafters with special guest Angela Spivey.
title: Eugene Cole & Persuaded: Live: Jesus Is the Balm
